attributes.additional_details: These are people who risk their lives for us on peace keeping missions, terrorism etc. The least we could do is pay them better or at least the average salary...
attributes.background: A basic full time infantry soldier is paid £20,000 after tax that’s around 17k. Around £1,500 a month this is less than the average salary. I’m suggesting an increase in pay or a partial income tax cut for military personnel.

rejection.details: You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
